english.segment1: So long politics its time to start being me. Take the chains off my lips its time to set my tongue free. Some might just turn their heads but some will raise a fist. english.segment2: In a world that tries to water You down. Where beliefs cannot be spoken too loud. Ill stand for You. Where they claim Your way isnt wide enough. And they do their best just to cover You up. Ill stand for You
english.segment3: Hello reality its time we embrace honesty. Teach me to speak with truth and love and with humility. You made a promise that Youre coming back to earth. Find More lyrics at www.sweetslyrics.com. So how selfish am I if I dont go tell the world. They say just be sincere. but could they all just be sincerely wrong?
english.segment4: They might remove Your name from money. But You own it all the same. They kicked You out of school thats funny. Cause how could You go away?. In a land thats built upon Your word.
